title: Garnier Skincare Moisture Rescue Refreshing Gel-Cream for Dry Skin for Dry Skin, 1.7 Fluid Ounce
description: Garnier moisture rescue captures the power of antioxidant fruit water. Together with skin-healthy humectants that resemble skin's natural water-binding functions, this refreshing gel-cream, helps replenish skin's moisture reserves for 24 hours and helps defend skin from external aggressors. This ultra-lightweight, oil-free gel-cream contains 2x more moisturizing agents than our moisture rescue refreshing gel-cream for normal skin.

title: Garnier The Radiance Renewer Cleansing Gelee for Dull Skin, 8 Fluid Ounce
description: Dermatologist tested for safety. Oil-free. Gentle on skin.
